post:
Hello,

I recently brought a dedicated server located in France for a project. After receiving the server a friend of mine give me a large VPS on his server.

The server has an i3-3220, 8GB RAM, 2x1TB HDD in RAID 1.
I have 3 IP's in total. (Server paid for 3 months)

I'd like to know if anyone want's some game server hosting, it will be relatively low priced and paid monthly. 

If you want to host a game server please state which game you want hosted below and I'll PM you if I think it would be viable.
